title: Senior Backend Engineer
description:
# Senior Backend Engineer

**We are looking for an experienced Backend Engineer** to join our growing engineering team.

## Responsibilities
- Design, implement, and maintain backend services and APIs using **Node.js** and **Express**.
- Collaborate with frontend engineers to define and integrate RESTful APIs.
- Write clean, testable, and maintainable code; perform code reviews.
- Troubleshoot and optimize performance and scalability of services.
- Participate in architecture discussions and drive technical decisions.

## Requirements
- 4+ years professional experience building backend services in Node.js/TypeScript.
- Strong understanding of databases (MongoDB, PostgreSQL) and data modeling.
- Experience with authentication, authorization, and secure API design.
- Familiarity with testing frameworks and CI/CD pipelines.
- Solid knowledge of HTTP, REST, and web security best practices.

**What we offer:** competitive salary, flexible work environment, and growth opportunities.

title: Frontend Developer
description:
# Frontend Developer

Join our product team as a **Frontend Developer** focused on building delightful user experiences.

## Responsibilities
- Build and maintain responsive web applications using **React** and **TypeScript**.
- Implement UI designs, component libraries and ensure cross-browser compatibility.
- Optimize performance and accessibility.
- Collaborate with designers and backend engineers to deliver features.
- Write unit and integration tests to ensure high quality.

## Requirements
- 3+ years experience with React and TypeScript.
- Strong understanding of state management, hooks, and component patterns.
- Familiarity with build tools (Vite, Webpack) and testing frameworks (Jest, React Testing Library).
- Good eye for detail and UX sensibilities.

**Benefits:** Remote-friendly, flexible hours, and a training budget.

title: DevOps Engineer
description:
# DevOps Engineer

We are seeking a **DevOps Engineer** to help automate and scale our infrastructure.

## Responsibilities
- Build and maintain CI/CD pipelines, infrastructure as code (Terraform).
- Monitor, alert, and troubleshoot production systems.
- Work with engineering teams to enable reliable deployments and observability.
- Harden systems for security and compliance.

## Requirements
- 3+ years experience with cloud platforms (AWS/Azure/GCP).
- Experience with Docker, Kubernetes, Terraform, and CI tools.
- Strong Linux skills and scripting (Bash, Python).
- Familiarity with logging/monitoring stacks (Prometheus, Grafana, ELK).

**Perks:** Equipment allowance and well-being benefits.

title: Full Stack Developer
description:
# Full Stack Developer

Work across frontend and backend to deliver end-to-end features using **React**, **Node.js** and **Postgres**.

## Requirements
- 3+ years building web applications.
- Comfortable with both client and server side development.

**Why join:** cross-functional teams and career growth.

title: Data Scientist
description:
# Data Scientist

Use data to drive product decisions and build ML models in Python.

## Requirements
- Strong statistics and ML background.
- Experience with scikit-learn, pandas, and model deployment.

title: Product Manager
description:
# Product Manager

Lead product discovery and define roadmaps for customer-focused products.

## Requirements
- Experience shipping consumer or B2B products.
- Strong communication and prioritization skills.

title: UX/UI Designer
description:
# UX/UI Designer

Design intuitive interfaces and collaborate closely with engineers and PMs.

## Requirements
- Portfolio demonstrating UX process and visual design.

title: Mobile Developer
description:
# Mobile Developer

Build and maintain cross-platform mobile apps using React Native or native SDKs.

## Requirements
- Experience with mobile lifecycle and performance optimization.

title: QA Engineer
description:
# QA Engineer

Ensure product quality through automated and manual testing.

## Requirements
- Familiarity with test automation frameworks and writing clear test cases.

title: Systems Analyst
description:
# Systems Analyst

Analyze business requirements and translate them into technical solutions.

## Requirements
- Strong problem solving and communication skills.

title: Network Administrator
description:
# Network Administrator

Manage and maintain corporate network infrastructure.

## Requirements
- Experience with routing, switching, and firewalls.

title: Database Administrator
description:
# Database Administrator

Maintain and optimize relational and NoSQL databases.

## Requirements

title: Cybersecurity Analyst
description:
# Cybersecurity Analyst

Monitor security incidents and harden systems to reduce risk.

## Requirements
- Experience with SIEM, incident response and vulnerability assessments.

title: Cloud Engineer
description:
# Cloud Engineer

Design and operate scalable cloud infrastructure (AWS/GCP/Azure).

## Requirements
- Experience with IaC, container orchestration and cloud networking.

title: Machine Learning Engineer
description:
# Machine Learning Engineer

Productionize ML models and build data pipelines.

## Requirements
- Experience with model deployment, feature stores and MLOps practices.

title: Site Reliability Engineer
description:
# Site Reliability Engineer

Improve system reliability through automation and observability.

## Requirements

title: Backend Engineer
description:
# Backend Engineer

Implement APIs and services that power our products.

## Requirements
- Experience with Node.js/TypeScript or other backend stacks.

title: Frontend Engineer
description:
# Frontend Engineer

Build performant and accessible user interfaces using React.

## Requirements
- Solid knowledge of modern frontend tooling and testing.
